myControl

Class GuestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • myControl.GuestManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GuestManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is a control class that manages all guests in the HOTEL APP. All methods are implemented as static
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Method to initialize static class guest manager.

      • addGuest

        public static java.lang.String addGuest(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.String creditCardNum)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to add a guest into the system. Auto generates a guestID based on number of guests already in system.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the Guest
        creditCardNum - Credit Card Details of guest
        Returns:
        return Guest details if successfully created
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw Exception when the input parameters are null.

      • updateGuest

        public static java.lang.String updateGuest(java.lang.String guestID,
                                           java.lang.String newCreditCardNumber)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to update guest information. May be extended to add more details. calls searchGuest to retrieve guestObject;
        Parameters:
        guestID - GuestID of the intended guest
        newCreditCardNumber - new credit card number
        Returns:
        return Guest new details if successfully updated
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - threw when guestID has error

      • listAllGuest

        public static java.lang.String listAllGuest()
        Method to list all guests details iteratively. This Method will list all guests in the collection.
        Returns:
        a formated string containing all guests information

      • getGuestDetails

        public static java.lang.String getGuestDetails(java.lang.String guestID)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to retrieve a guest's details. This method takes in a string guestID and attempts to search for the guest object with the same ID in the list. Calls upon searchGuest to perform the lookup.
        Parameters:
        guestID - intended guest to be searched for
        Returns:
        guest's details
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception throw by search guest

      • checkIn

        public static java.lang.String checkIn(java.lang.String guestID,
                                       java.lang.String roomID)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Method for walk in guest to check into room. This method will search for guest based on ID and roomID from
        Parameters:
        guestID - String id of guest
        roomID - String id of room
        Returns:
        a string to indicate the success is successful.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws exceptions when guest or room is not found or target room is not vacant or adding reference to list fails

                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Method for getting the list of ordered services that the guest had made.
        Parameters:
        guestID - string of guest ID
        Returns:
        a list of room service item ordered by the user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throw exception when guestID is not found or when the target guest has not ordered any roomService

        Parameters:
        guestID - String id of target guest
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • checkIn

        public static java.lang.String checkIn(java.lang.String guestID)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Method for getting the guest to checkIn with an reservation.
        Parameters:
        guestID - String id of target guest
        Returns:
        returns a to string object to show that guest has checked into the room
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exceptions throw when guest ID is not found or when no reservations has been made or expired

      • checkout

        public static java.lang.String checkout(java.lang.String guestID,
                                        boolean byCreditCard)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Method for guest to check out.
        Parameters:
        guestID - String id of guest
        byCreditCard - Boolean to indicate payment by credit card (true) or cash (false)
        Returns:
        receipt String object to list down all costs incurred by the guest
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown when guest is not found or when guest is not checked in

      • isCheckedIn

                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to check if the guest has checked in.
        Parameters:
        guestID - String id of guest
        Returns:
        boolean true for checked in false for not checked in
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws by searchGuest method when guestID does not exist in system

        Method to check if the guest has Reservation.
        Parameters:
        guestID - String id of guest
        Returns:
        boolean true for reservation made otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws by searchGuest method when guestID does not exist in system
